com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class DraggableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.DraggableComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IFixedComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DraggableContainer

    public class DraggableComponent
extends ComponentProxy
implements IFixedComponent
    Fixed component wrapper that can be dragged by another component.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Point attachPoint
      Point storing the point, were the user started to drag the panel.
      protected boolean dragging
      Flag indicating whether the user is dragging the component with the mouse.
      protected IFixedComponent fixedComponent
      The fixed component to be dragged.
